content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image media=”111552″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”906105″][vc_column_text uncode_shortcode_id=”748842″]In this blog post, we are introducing our Call a Jet team members, as well as our office in Budapest![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text uncode_shortcode_id=”170149″]Since 2008, when the company was established by our CEO Joe Kurta, we have been aiming to make private traveling more affordable, that is, bringing luxury closer to everyone.

Call a Jet started in Germany, but ever since we have grown at a rapid pace, which enabled us to open an office in the heart of Budapest as well in 2018.

With the opening of the Hungarian office, Gabriella and Greta joined to Joe and Yuliya. At the end of 2022, we expanded our team with Arina:[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column column_width_percent=”70″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/4″ uncode_shortcode_id=”139189″][vc_single_image media=”4259″ media_width_percent=”100″ excerpt.rendered: Visit us in Budapest and have a coffee with us!
